title: DNS-SD _services._dns-sd._udp.local. (find all service types) does not work
body: DNS-SD _services._dns-sd._udp.local. (find all service types) does not work.

comments.body:
I too am having problems with the Windows.Devices.Enumeration and its DeviceWatcher with DN-SD with C++/WinRT.
My have 2 network connections in my machines and only those services on machines connected via the first card are found.
Using the dns-sd command line tool finds all the advertised services on both networks.
This happens both in my own test program and when I extend the DeviceEnumeration sample progam in Microsoft's "Windows Universal Samples".
Help!

Using the new Windows::Devices::Enumeration with DeviceWatcher (as explained in https://channel9.msdn.com/Events/Build/2015/3-79), I only get some Added events for the service I was looking for, but missing quite a few as compared to using Bonjour or Avahi.
(Windows SDK 10.0.1734.0 with VS 2017 15.8.0, c++/winRT).
Has someone else had any success with this API doing any DNS-SD?
